<script>
  // Wait for everything to be fully loaded, including Quarto navbar tools
  window.addEventListener('load', function() {
    function initThemeToggle() {
      // Try multiple selectors to find the theme toggle button
      const themeToggle = document.querySelector('a[aria-label="Toggle dark mode"]') || 
                        document.querySelector('.quarto-navigation-tool');
      const htmlElement = document.documentElement;
      
      if (!themeToggle) {
        // Try again after a short delay
        setTimeout(initThemeToggle, 100);
        return;
      }
      
      const themeIcon = themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (!themeIcon) {
        setTimeout(initThemeToggle, 100);
        return;
      }
      
      // Add ID and fix the double "bi-" prefix in the icon class
      themeToggle.id = 'theme-toggle';
      
      // Check for saved theme preference or default to light mode
      const currentTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
      
      // Set initial theme
      if (currentTheme === 'dark') {
        htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'dark');
        themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-sun-fill';
      } else {
        htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'light');
        themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-moon-fill';
      }
      
      // Theme toggle functionality
      themeToggle.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const currentTheme = htmlElement.getAttribute('data-bs-theme');
        
        if (currentTheme === 'dark') {
          htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'light');
          themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-moon-fill';
          localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
        } else {
          htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'dark');
          themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-sun-fill';
          localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
        }
      });
    }
    
    initThemeToggle();
  });
</script>
